page.title: 03AN INTERESTING PERSON
page.content: Mr Gibson is a friendly bachelor who has lived in Medomsley all of his life and loves the village,its people and nature.What annoys him most is the increased vandalism of our village. He has had a happy life working since he was 16 on the land, and building up his own market garden business and rearing cattle on his land.Life was tough,but with a 12 hour day he was his own boss.From tractor to van,he sold his produce around the village.He has seen many changes, enjoying tarmac roads and the bus service,but rejected electricity and television.He loves natural things. In his retirement he reads,gardens and travels on local bus routes.He is a great churchman and was a governor of our school for 22 years.As a boy he liked marzipan bars,meccano,woodwork and gardening.
